meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unfashionable.
meanings.sent1: Her unfashionableness stood out in a sea of trendy outfits.
meanings.sent2: His unfashionableness was evident in his choice of outdated clothing.
meanings.sent3: Despite her unfashionableness, she rocked her unique style with confidence.
meanings.sent4: The unfashionableness of his attire was like a blast from the past.
meanings.sent5: The unfashionableness of the neon leg warmers was hard to ignore.

meanings.definition: The lack of conformity to current trends or styles.
meanings.sent1: The unfashionableness of her outfit made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: His unfashionableness was a deliberate choice to express his individuality.
meanings.sent3: Despite the unfashionableness of his haircut, he owned his unique look.
meanings.sent4: Her unfashionableness was a statement against the pressure to follow trends.
meanings.sent5: The unfashionableness of his vintage jacket was a conversation starter.
